question: Which of the following movement inspired Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel to become a follower of Gandhiji?
explanation: The Kheda Satyagraha was organized by Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi in the Kheda district of Gujarat, India during the period of the British Raj. Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel became a follower of Gandhiji inspired by the Kheda Movement.
